img.title: Wifi
img.alt: RCS to Provide External WiFi in some locations

div.a: RCS to Provide External WiFi in some locations

br.span: Reynoldsburg City Schools is able to provide external Wifi access in designated areas outside of our buildings for those with an RCS-owned device.
The Class of 2020 will be celebrated on Saturday, June 6, 2020

span.span: Read about our plan for handling distance learning grading, retention, and graduation requirements for the 2019-20 academic year.

img.title: RCS Logo
img.alt: RCS Closed for the Remainder of the Academic Year

div.a: RCS Closed for the Remainder of the Academic Year

span.span: Governor Mike DeWine announced all K-12 schools will close for the remainder of the 2019-20 academic school year in response to the continued dangers posed by of COVID-19.

a.title: A week of meals can be picked up on Mondays at Livingston from 10am-1pm. Your child does not have to be with you. Please practice social distancing while in line. Location: Livingston Starting at: 10:00 AM Ending at: 1:00 PM

The Finance Committee will meet on Wednesday, April 29th, 5:00 p.m. at the Reynoldsburg City Schools Central Office, 7244 East Main St.

Anyone wishing to attend the meeting is asked to notify Judy Eck no later than 12:00 p.m. at Jeck@reyn.org or 614-501-1017 on 4/29/20 so that the District can ensure proper social distancing and safety.

Location: 7244 E. Main Street Starting at: 5:00 PM
Location: Cafeteria Starting at: 6:00 PM Ending at: 7:00 PM
